subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ray Whitney needed only one minute and 40 seconds to notch his second N.H.L. hat trick and lift the Carolina Hurricanes to a 5-2 victory against the host Boston Bruins Thursday night.
snippet: Ray Whitney needed only one minute and 40 seconds to notch his second N.H.L. hat trick and lift the Carolina Hurricanes to a 5-2 victory against the host Boston Bruins Thursday night.
